   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to scNOT's documentation!
=================================

**scNOT** is a Python library for single cell analysis by machine learning methods. It implements two machine learning structures proposed by the papers `CellOT <https://assets.researchsquare.com/files/rs-1805107/v1_covered.pdf?c=1663081590>`_ and `CondOT <https://arxiv.org/pdf/2206.14262.pdf>`_ and offers an *intuitive* API.
Check out the :doc:`usage` section for further information, including how to
:ref:`install <installation>` the project.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

==================
